results.title: Metformin fights against radiation-induced early developmental toxicity.
results.text_hl: In this study, we explored the radioprotective effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MET@@@ on the @<m>DISEASE_Musculoskeletal_Abnormalities</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009139 @@@developmental abnormalities and deformities@@@ induced by irradiation among three "star drugs".

citations.NLM: Wang B, Dong J, Xiao H, Li Y, Jin Y, Cui M, Zhang SQ, Fan SJ. Metformin fights against radiation-induced early developmental toxicity. Sci Total Environ. 2020 Aug 25;732():139274. PMID: 32438158
